text: Fantastic Four is a 2005 American superhero movie based on the Marvel Comics comic Fantastic Four. The movie was released in the United States on July 8, 2005. == Cast == *Ioan Gruffudd as Reed Richards / Mister Fantastic *Jessica Alba as Susan Storm / Invisible Woman *Chris Evans as Johnny Storm / Human Torch *Michael Chiklis as Benjamin Grimm / The Thing *Julian McMahon as Victor Von Doom / Doctor Doom *Kerry Washington as Alicia Masters *Stan Lee as Willie Lumpkin == References == == Other websites == * Category:2005 action movies Category:2005 science fiction movies Category:2000s superhero movies Category:Fantastic Four (movie series) Category:2000s American action movies Category:2000s American fantasy movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies based on comic book characters Category:Movies composed by John Ottman Category:Movies directed by Tim Story Category:Movies produced by Avi Arad Category:Superhero comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Fantastic Four (2005 movie)
